a second valve member (5, 105) forming a movable chamber wall portion of said valve chamber (2, 102), said second valve member (5, 105) being spring-loaded against a second valve seat (6, 106) in said direction of the actuating force, said second valve member (5, 105) comprising a through hole (10, 1 10) for allowing said hydraulic fluid flow out of the valve chamber (2, 102) during normal operation, wherein said spring-loaded first valve member (3, 103) is arranged to close said through hole (10, 1 10) during said fail-safe operation such that said pressure is mechanically regulated by said second valve member (5, 105) acting on said second valve seat (6, 106).
2. A valve device (1 , 101 ) as claimed in any one of the preceding claims, wherein said first valve member (3, 103) is spring-loaded by a first spring means (7, 107).

3. A valve device (1 , 101 ) as claimed in any one of the preceding claims, wherein said first spring means (7, 107) is arranged between said first valve member (3, 103) and said first valve seat (4, 104).

4. A valve device (1 , 101 ) as claimed in claim 2 or 3, wherein a valve characteristic of said valve device is adjustable and/or tunable by selecting said first spring means from a group of first spring means having different spring characteristics.
5. A valve device (1 , 101 ) as claimed in any one of the preceding claims, wherein said first valve member (3, 103) is adapted to receive said actuating force (F) via an actuating rod (8, 108).

6. A valve device (1 , 101 ) as claimed in claim 5, wherein said actuating rod (8, 108) is arranged to be guided by a valve device portion (9, 109), and wherein said first valve member (3, 103) is arranged to be guided by said actuating rod (8, 108), to limit said actuating rod (8, 108) and the first valve member (3, 103) to be movable in the axial direction.

7. A valve device (1 , 101 ) as claimed in any one of the preceding claims, wherein said first valve member (3, 103) and/or actuating rod (8, 108) is arranged to extend through an additional through hole or said through hole (10, 1 10) in said second valve member (5, 105).
8. A valve assembly (1 , 101 ) as claimed in claim 7, wherein a flow passage is formed by a space between an inner wall portion of said through hole (10,
1 10) or said additional through hole and said first valve member (3, 103) and/or said actuating rod (8, 108) extending there through.

9. A valve device as (1 , 101 ) claimed in claim 8, wherein said first valve member (3, 103) is provided with a first annular closing surface (1 1 , 1 1 1 ) arranged to contact a second annular surface (12, 1 12) of said second valve member in order to close said flow passage.
10. A valve device (1 , 101 ) as claimed in claim 9, wherein said first annular closing surface (1 1 , 1 1 1 ) is tapered towards said flow passage.
1 1 . A valve device (1 , 101 ) as claimed in any one the preceding claims, wherein said second valve member (5, 105) is disk-shaped and flexible.

12. A valve device (1 , 101 ) as claimed in claim 1 1 , wherein said valve device further comprises an abutment element (22, 122) against which said second valve member (5, 105) is resiliently biased to spring-load said second valve member against said second valve seat (6, 106).

13. A valve device (1 , 101 ) as claimed in claim 1 1 or 12, wherein a valve characteristic of said valve device is adjustable and/or tunable by selecting said second valve member from a group of second valve members having different flexibility characteristics.
14. A valve device (1 , 101 ) as claimed in any one of the claims 1 -1 1 , wherein said second valve member is spring-loaded against said second valve seat by a second spring means (13, 1 13).
15. A valve device (1 , 101 ) as claimed in claim 14, wherein said first spring means (7, 107) has a lower spring load than said second spring means (13, 1 13).

16. A valve device (1 , 101 ) as claimed in claim 14 or 15, wherein a valve characteristic of said valve device is adjustable and/or tunable by selecting said second spring means from a group of second spring means having different spring characteristics.
17. A valve device (1 , 101 ) as claimed in any one of the preceding claims, wherein said second valve member comprises at least one orifice for allowing hydraulic fluid flow out of said chamber.

18. A valve device (1 , 101 ) as claimed in any one of the preceding claims, wherein said valve device comprises at least one orifice with a fixed restriction area for allowing hydraulic fluid flow into said chamber.

19. A valve device (1 , 101 ) as claimed in any one of the preceding claims, wherein said through hole or flow passage is configured, relative the restricted hydraulic fluid flow (q) into said valve chamber, to unrestrictedly allow hydraulic fluid flow (q) out of said chamber (2, 102) during said normal operation.

20. A valve device (1 , 101 ) as claimed in any one of the preceding claims, wherein said first valve member (3, 103) and said first valve seat (4, 104) are arranged to, relative to the restricted hydraulic fluid flow (q) out of said valve chamber, unrestrictedly allow hydraulic fluid flow (q) into said chamber (2, 102) during said fail-safe operation.
